column1: I am so angry right now, I can't believe they cancelled my favorite show!
My daughter just took her first steps today, I'm so happy and proud!
The food at this restaurant is absolutely disgusting, I feel sick.
I'm really scared about my upcoming surgery next week.
What a beautiful day, the sun is shining and birds are singing!
I miss my old friends, it makes me feel sad sometimes.
Oh my god! I just won the lottery, I can't believe it! What a surprise!
I'm feeling quite neutral about the whole situation.
The news today was really shocking and frightening.
This is the best day ever, I got promoted at work!
I feel terrible about what happened yesterday, it's making me sad.
Wow! They just announced a sequel to my favorite movie, I'm so excited!
